resources.string: Hit the {ion-android-search} to start searching for Pokemon hotspots near you!\n\n Narrow your search by letting us know which Pokemon you want!
We failed to find Pokemon for you. Please try again later.

It looks like we don\'t have any Pokemon data matching your search criteria. Click the {ion-ios-bookmarks} button to change that!\n\n You can also reach out to us by clicking the {ion-android-mail} in the toolbar above, and we\'ll help you get data in your area!
Please enter in a valid Pokemon name.
